frameDefinitions: An Item is detached from a Source, or Items are detached from each other.
An Entity changes from a Prior_state to a Post_state in a sequence that follows a pre-defined plan, expectation, or model of change.
A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.

An Initial_element is converted into a Final_element via a process of decay, fusion, or fission which changes the number or type of hadrons (protons or neutrons) in the nucleus of the atoms that make up the Element.
In this frame a Patient, which is  an organic substance, undergoes the natural process of decaying from an Initial_state to a Result.

A Financial_instrument (a bond or insurance) fulfills a condition at a certain Time after which the Issuer of the Financial_instrument is legally obligated to pay the Holder a monetary Value, based on the instrument's original Principle and the Interest rate.
frameExamples: When the snow plow is <t>disconnected</t> from the vehicle, extend the lift cylinder to the end of its stroke and coat the chrome rod with a light grease.
Their offensive armament has <t>developed</t> from short range missiles to long-range ballistic weaponry in a relatively short period .
This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
5.5 percent of nucleii <t>decay</t> from tritium to He3 in a year .
The leaves <t>rotted</t> into a mass of slime.
The bond had <t>matured</t> to its full value at 30 years.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Item</fen> identifies the entity that is detached from a <fen>Source</fen>.
<fen>Items</fen> identifies the plural items that are detached from each other.
<fen>Source</fen> identifies the location from which the <fen>Item</fen>(s) is detached.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location where the Progress occurs.
The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.
A substance definable in terms of the kind(s) of atoms that make it up.
The type of <fen>Element</fen> that results from the process.
The type of <fen>Element</fen> that begins the process.
The time at which the <fen>Element</fen> undergoes the transformation.
The location where the nuclear process occurs.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that undergoes a change.
The <fen>Time</fen> indicates when the rotting occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the rotting occurs.
The bond, insurance, or debt security which a Holder buys from an Issuer.
listRoleExamples: I feel like <fex>my head</fex> is detached from the rest of my body.
<fex>The neck vertebrae</fex> are unfused in rorquals and gray whales, which allows for some flexibility at the head and neck.
The toilet is loose <fex>from the floor</fex> and must be repaired.
Advances <fex>in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.
<fex>When</fex> did the X-wing progress beyond the drawing board?
Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.
<fex>The leaves</fex> rotted into a mass of slime.
<fex>Before he could get to the specimen</fex> , its entrails had decomposed so badly that they had to be thrown away.
Any traces of uneaten food will decompose <fex>in your tank</fex> and foul the water.
